name: Subliminal Puzzle Platter!! [1.0.]
description:
Enjoy this Sampler of Puzzles from upcoming Subliminal Mind Games!! See how long it takes you to solve them all. Feel free to report your findings and to become an official Taste Tester at the Game Design Symposium:

Don't forget to check out Dream Jam MMXXI!!

Rinzai Gigen,

Subliminal Mind Games.

[({R.G.||S.M.G.||G.D.S.)}]
